name.name: name
name.description: Possible interface name to search for on specific node
name.validation_error_text: Parameter name only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

node.name: node
node.validation_error_text: Parameter node only accepts valid RFC1123 host/domain names.

name: get_interfaces
description: returns all interfaces on a node or a specific interface if specified
